node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `patch` ( `patch_id` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `for_node` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `field` char(80) NOT NULL default '', `reason` char(80) NOT NULL default '', `applied` datetime default NULL, `applied_by` int(11) default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`patch_id`), KEY `for_node` (`for_node`,`applied`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
node.title: patch
